Flow.description: LEM-449,LEM-553: Create Quote from Opportunity LEM-5125: Hot fix to allow Quote Creation for CPG Accounts in US, CA, AUS, NZ LEM-5412: Add a new logic to check if any existing quotes with status "Out for Signature" or "Contract Singed" is found in the opportunity. LEM-6714: On an existing Opportunity, allow quote creation only for Ads Promo Deals LEM-9564: Set "Is_this_for_Ads_promos__c" to yes or No based on the opportunity subtype LEM-10422: New Quote Status - Self-Serve Activated - Sets "Self-Serve Opportunity/Quote" flag to True based on Opportunity Deal Type LEM-11452: Hotfix remove default quote line group LEM:12653: Pre-Create Quote Group - revised CCP scope LEM:12257: Ability to toggle the Opportunity Deal Type between ‘Full-Serve’ and ‘Self-Serve’ LEM-9973: Remove ads and promo prompt LEM-13378: Added SMB Rx related validations. LEM-14085: Added SMB Preferred Language validation LEM-14802: Added Opportunity Brand Relationship Validation prior to Quote Creation LEM-16198: Auto update the Pricing Type field on Business Account when more than one core Contract is identified LEM-17709: Added Account Legal Business Name Validation prior to Quote Creation LEM-19800: When product insights with Brand Licensing is present on related existing opp is present then contracting flow will be Templatized wet-sign LEM-20708: Removing Legal Business Name validation from Create Quote Flow LEM-24062: Show warning message to avoid create Pricing Variations Quotes accidentally

fields.name: Show_warning_Ads_promos_validation
fields.fieldText:
You are about to create a Pricing variation quote which will trigger redlining flow. Please validate before moving forward. If the intention is to amend an existing contract, please click on 'Create Amendment'.

If your intention is not to create a pricing variation quote, please click on 'X' icon, this will land you on Opportunity details page.
